name: Real Life RPG
description:
![null](<http://www.abload.de/img/o-bannerx8dtp.png>)

SC2-Mapster Forum Thread: Will Follow!

Status: Development Updates will be Posted on my Website which is in Development actually or here Weekly / Monthly.

### To-Do

- A better Light System 
- Complete Terrain Details 
- Bank 
- Car Drive System 
- Rail System 
- Sex Selection 
- Inventory System 
- Save & Load 
- Custom Loading Screen 
- Camera Selection 
- Job System 
- Poll System 
- Streets 
- New Chat System 
- Car Shop 
- Second and Thirt City 
- Minigames for Casinos 
- Meeting Points 
- Weather System 
- House System 
- Third Person Camera 



- More will come 



The Map can be Played by a maximum of 10 Players. To reach another City you can use a Car or a Train which comes to planned Times or if u have enough Time u can Walk :-)

Jobs in Progress are:

- Farmer 
- Police Officer 
- Train Driver 
- Banker 
- Drug Dealer 
- House Seller 
- Car Seller 



More Jobs will come, for Ideas you can write that in this Thread and I will try to Implent them in the Map . Another future I have Planned is to have his Own Home / House and you will get everytime you Play on one of the Real Life RPG Maps a House in the Size you bought.

Im open for every Idea you have so Post it here bellow in the Comments.
